column1: #Text=It would be better to elect a really good first female president, not a corrupt one with lots of baggage.
#Text=Also, Clinton represented the status quo and people wanted a change.
#Text=What really is too bad is that the Democrats in 2008 rejected Hillary for another male.
#Text=A more energized Clinton without so much baggage would have been more electable especially after Bush.
#Text=Funny have the Democrats have trouble self-reflecting.
